mapper.sql: id, service_code, old_code, type, category, title, summary, require_instruction, attachment_id, remark, unit_ids, unit_names, deadline, registrant, reg_time, state, deleted, process_instance_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from matter
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into matter (id, service_code, old_code, type, category, title, summary, require_instruction, attachment_id, remark, unit_ids, unit_names, deadline, registrant, reg_time, state, deleted, process_instance_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requireInstruction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id,
service_code,
old_code,

summary,
require_instruction,
attachment_id,
remark,
unit_ids,

mapper.update:
update matter
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
service_code = #{record.serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
old_code = #{record.oldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER},

deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
process_instance_id = #{record.processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update matter set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_code = #{record.serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_code = #{record.oldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category = #{record.category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{record.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, require_instruction = #{record.requireInstruction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attachment_id = #{record.attachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_ids = #{record.unitIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_names = #{record.unitNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deadline = #{record.deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registrant = #{record.registrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reg_time = #{record.regTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_instance_id = #{record.processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update matter
service_code = #{serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
old_code = #{oldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
